column4: How to install and update new softwares in my home system .. which is not having internet .. i have install 10.04 desktop in home
you'll need to put the 10.4 cd in and run $ apt-cdrom add
but if the 10.4 cd you have is not newer than the one you installed, the point is moot
thank you .. in office i am using ubuntu 10.04 .. i can easily update my system caz i hv internet .. in home i don't hv for this what can i do
